sentence: The issue also could boost Democrat Stacey Abrams in Georgia, who narrowly lost to Governor Brian Kemp four years ago.
author: Gabriella Borter and James Oliphant
title: Democrats Look To Abortion-rights Threat To Boost Midterm Election Prospects

sentence: The issue also could boost Democrat Stacey Abrams in Georgia, who narrowly lost to Governor Brian Kemp four years ago.

title: Democrats look to abortion-rights threat to boost midterm election prospects
